short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that automatically converts times on websites to your local timeozone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever opened a website to check some event time, only to find the time is not in your timezone and you have to do mental math or open a new tab to convert it to your timezone? Timezoner is here to save the day! Timezoner will automatically converts times on websites to your local time. No more mental math or extra tabs.

Disclaimer:
Timezones are tricky.... and complicated. And because of that, it's not guaranteed the extension will work every single time. After all, there are numerous ways to specify a time with timezone. But, constant development is in progress to account for as many cases as possible. And if you face any issues where the extension is not working as expected, be sure to open an issue on github or just reach out in the support server.
